ygData.messageBody:
>Absolutly, as a wizard, you are the groups panic button. Fighting a steady
>stream of blues, a group that includes a cleric will almost have no use for
>us until the puller yells, "Oh Shit, I pulled something big guys, get
>ready" That is when we shine. With our burns, nobody can save the
>situation
>faster than a wizard.

I agree. In panic train situations, you may even find that you don't even
need to kill the Mobs...you just need to nuke them down to about 20%..that's
where they turn tail and start walking away. That's one less Mob that the
tanks have to worry about.

Of course, it's wise to go after that Mob or else he'll come back after a
little rest. Either finish off that Mob with a nuke, or arrange one of your
tanks to break off of battle and go after that one. I think this works for
Mobs in both Cazic and Mistmoore.

If it's not as crazy, it's best to wait a little longer so you can get the
kill shot and save your group from a chase. :)

Whoohoo, trains are exciting sometimes...when you live of course heh.

-- Lim'Dul
